mapper.select: SELECT id, userno, loginname, username, cell, phone, email, qq, crtuser, DATE_FORMAT(crtdate, '%Y-%m-%d') crtdate, upduser, DATE_FORMAT(upddate, '%Y-%m-%d') upddate, part, (select data_name from bs_basedict where dict_code = 'YG001' and data_code = part) partname, part_job, m_role_id, adminflg FROM user where binary loginname = #{loginname} and password = #{password} and recsts = 1

SELECT id, userno, loginname, username, cell, phone, email, qq, crtuser, DATE_FORMAT(crtdate, '%Y-%m-%d') crtdate, upduser, DATE_FORMAT(upddate, '%Y-%m-%d') upddate, part, (select data_name from bs_basedict where dict_code = 'YG001' and data_code = part) partname, part_job, m_role_id, adminflg, (select role_name from m_role m where m.m_role_id = u.m_role_id) role_name FROM user u
and userno like CONCAT('%', #{userno}, '%')
and username like CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')

select id, userno, loginname, username, cell, phone, email, qq, crtuser, DATE_FORMAT(crtdate, '%Y-%m-%d') crtdate, upduser, DATE_FORMAT(upddate, '%Y-%m-%d') upddate, part, (select data_name from bs_basedict where dict_code = 'YG001' and data_code = part) partname, part_job, m_role_id, adminflg from user where id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user where userno = #{userno} or loginname = #{loginname}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user where id in #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(userno, loginname, password, username, cell, phone, email, qq, crtuser, crtdate, upduser, upddate, part, part_job) VALUE (#{userno}, #{loginname}, #{password}, #{username}, #{cell}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{qq}, #{crtuser}, now(), #{crtuser}, now(), #{part}, #{part_job})
